# 24-inch Thin Bezel Monitors for Environment Canada and Climate Change

## Solicitation Details

*   **Solicitation No.:** [2BH4176456/AD](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login)
*   **Department:** Environment and Climate Change Canada
*   **Notification Period:** 15 days (November 19, 2024 to December 3, 2024)
*   **Date:** December 3, 2024 (14:00:00 local time)

## Description of Requirement

Environment Canada and Climate Change requires 24-inch thin bezel monitors for weather forecasting purposes at the Meteorological Service of Canada. The equipment must be delivered to various locations across Canada.

## Security Requirements and Land Claims

*   **Security Requirements:** N/A
*   **Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements (CLCA):** N/A

## Evaluation and Award Criteria

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
A responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

## Submission Requirements

Submission documents can be written in either English or French.
Interest parties can access the solicitation and submit their bid by following the link: [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login).
